**José Miguel de Pablo** works as CRIDA A.I.E. (ATM Research and Development) Executive Director since his creation. Previously he has experience in both ANSP, at Enaire, and industry, at Indra. In parallel, he has been regular lecturer for Air Navigation, Analysis, Simulation and Performance matters at Technical University of Madrid.

He plays management and technical roles in multiple fora, such as all SESAR phases, various Framework Programs, Enaire strategic plans and a large number of research projects at national and European level. Other relevant memberships include being a long-standing participant of ACARE General Assembly (representing CANSO), USA/Europe ATM R&D Seminar Committee, EUROCONTROL operational and strategic working groups, EUROCAE, EATRADA, ASDA, and participation in national/regional government and professional bodies.
